quotes.message: She was always daydreaming. She never wanted to live in the real world; she always seemed to be separated from other children her age. They couldn’t understand her or her imagination. She was always thinking outside of the box, breaking rules, and only following what her heart told her was right.
quotes.name: Shannon A. Thompson

quotes.message: She never felt like she belonged anywhere,except for when she was lying on her bed, pretending to be somewhere else.
quotes.name: Rainbow Rowell Eleanor and Park

quotes.message: A daydream is a meal at which images are eaten. Some of us are gourmets, some gourmands, and a good many take their images precooked out of a can and swallow them down whole, absent-mindedly and with little relish.
quotes.name: W.H. Auden

quotes.message: There are certain half-dreaming moods of mind in which we naturally steal away from noise and glare, and seek some quiet haunt where we may indulge our reveries and build our air castles undisturbed.
quotes.name: Washington Irving

quotes.message: Lying in bed and daydreaming was the best thing I did all day.
quotes.name: Marty Rubin

quotes.message: Is daydreaming a distraction from work, or work a distraction from daydreaming?
quotes.name: Marty Rubin

quotes.message: We seek to escape the dark cave of a despondent mind by either dulling oneself mentally or through imaginative acts. One form of escapism is daydreaming.
quotes.name: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.message: I try to maintain a healthy dose of daydreaming to remain sane.
quotes.name: Florence Welch

quotes.message: In my head, this world is so much more beautiful. If you ever catch me daydream, please, don’t wake me up.
quotes.name: Mandy K

quotes.message: Daydreams are cool alright. Daydreams are nice, especially the ones about... food.
quotes.name: Doug Walker

quotes.message: Do you ever daydream? I do. That's the only time I'm really happy. Dreaming.
quotes.name: Charles Chaplin

quotes.message: I doze and daydream. I think about my life. I don't know what I did wrong. I'd feel better if I did.
quotes.name: Robert K. Massie

quotes.message: You're daydreamers instead of go-getters. In a way, you've got to be crazy. You're not satisfied to live with flying - you've got to be in love with it.
quotes.name: Frank Wead

quotes.message: On a street where reality is not much different from dreams I've had . A dream is all I have .
quotes.name: Y Adman Chris

quotes.message: Daydreaming, daydreaming into the night . And I'm alright . Daydreaming, daydreaming all the time .
quotes.name: Y Adman Chris

quotes.message: Daydreaming, just daydreaming .
quotes.name: Andre G Previn

quotes.message: Daydreaming, just daydreaming . Helps me find the joy, the boy I call my own . Night comes on, it's true I'm blue .
quotes.name: Andre G Previn

quotes.message: Daydreaming, just daydreaming . Please don't mind if I just sigh and stay . Stay dreaming, daydreaming .
quotes.name: Andre G Previn

quotes.message: So many times things pass you by . Imagination running wild . You've got to start choosing right from wrong .
quotes.name: Christopher Lowe

quotes.message: Life's happening now . And there's no time to sleep . Daydreaming, . You're daydreaming, . You dream of the day .
quotes.name: Kincaid Alan Smith

quotes.message: Daydreaming, . You're daydreaming, . You're dreaming your life away . Although the headlines scream at you, .
quotes.name: Kincaid Alan Smith

quotes.message: Well I'm floating on air when I'm daydreaming . I quietly observe standing in my space .
quotes.name: Adrian Nicholas Matthew Thaws

quotes.message: And we're all daydreaming now . Escape to another world . Live for another day .
quotes.name: Elliot Gleave

quotes.message: Where you been all of my life . I've been daydreaming 'bout you .
quotes.name: Brian Thomas Higgins

quotes.message: But I don't mind if I'm only daydreaming . If dreams can bring so near to me .
quotes.name: Walter Carl Becker

quotes.message: Day dream . Don't break my reverie . Until I find that she .
quotes.name: Billy Strayhorn

quotes.message: And you can be sure that if you're feeling right . A daydream will last long into the night . Tomorrow at breakfast you may prick up your ears .
quotes.name: John Sebastian

quotes.message: What a day for a daydream . Custom made for a daydreaming boy . And I'm lost in a daydream .
quotes.name: John Sebastian

quotes.message: Daydreaming . Under crying skies . Everything is better here .
quotes.name: Jorgen Keill Elofsson

quotes.message: A world in myself . Daydreaming admiring being . Quietly, open the world . I hear the time of the starry sky .
quotes.name: Elizabeth Fraser

quotes.message: I remember sitting back daydreaming . Bout a better life with finer things . To be honest I would do that a lot . But now our dreams turning into reality.
quotes.name: Reburst

quotes.message: Your greatness lies in your daydreams. But they are great only to the extent to which they inspire you to work and strive towards them. When they do, you will find that you are wiser and happier than you have ever been.
quotes.name: Robert O'Brien

quotes.message: Daydream If you have built castles in the air, that is where they should be; now put foundations under them.
quotes.name: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.message: How many of our daydreams would darken into nightmares were there any danger of their coming true.
quotes.name: Logan P. Smith

quotes.message: Vision without execution is a daydream. Execution without vision is a nightmare.
quotes.name: Japanese Proverb

quotes.message: I had a daydream about a nightmare. . Today is the only day you can live. . A sort stay leaves a good impression.
quotes.name: Joseph Julius Bonkowski

quotes.message: Sometimes I daydream. . I dream about life, . Trying to find a purpose.
quotes.name: Richard Adcock

quotes.message: I keep looking for a purpose . Like a hungry dog searching for food. . Sometimes I daydream, . Wishing I was someone else.
quotes.name: Richard Adcock

quotes.message: We are lost in the daydream landscapes we have created in our minds.
quotes.name: David Nichtern

quotes.message: Daydreaming , our ability to give 'to airy nothing. A local habitation and a name,' remains one of the most fascinating, if perplexing, phenomena in the vast range of human behavior.
quotes.name: Jerome L. Singer

quotes.message: Daydreaming or conscious fantasy seems most likely to occur under conditions relatively similar to those of night dreaming.
quotes.name: Jerome L. Singer

quotes.message: Since daydreams are so often visual, the movies are especially effective in capturing their quality.
quotes.name: Jerome L. Singer

quotes.message: It is a basic human pastime to daydream, in the sense of entertaining conscious and private fictions.
quotes.name: M. Regis

quotes.message: Daydreams are private fictions; few are wiling to submit their fantasies.
quotes.name: M. Regis

quotes.message: Daydreams are very common and yet they remain theoretically elusive.
quotes.name: M. Regis

quotes.message: One knows that a daydream is not real. It is not confused with present reality.
quotes.name: Teresa Brennan

quotes.message: Visionaries of every sort credit daydreams for creating conditions ripe for moments of insight to blossom.
quotes.name: Amy Fries

quotes.message: The beauty of daydreaming is that it's a process available to everyone of us.
quotes.name: Amy Fries

quotes.message: The uncensored aspect of daydreaming is also priceless in that it gives us both the means and the freedom to explore, without an internal critic hovering over us.
quotes.name: Amy Fries

quotes.message: What happens in your daydreams, stays in your daydreams, unless you choose to share.
quotes.name: Amy Fries

quotes.message: Daydreaming does not enjoy tremendous prestige in our culture, which tends to regard it as unproductive thought.
quotes.name: Michael Pollan

quotes.message: Daydreaming with pencil and paper is a respectable form of meditation.
quotes.name: John Howe

quotes.message: A daydream is a meal at which images are eaten. Some of us are gourmets.
quotes.name: W. H. Auden

quotes.message: Daydreaming is okay, even better if you can make some lasting memory out of it.
quotes.name: Leslie Dean Brown

quotes.message: A story in your head isn't a story. It's just a daydream until you actually write it down. So write it down.
quotes.name: Andy Weir

quotes.message: You can spend your time daydreaming or make use of it in other ways.
quotes.name: Erik Qualman

quotes.message: I was trying to daydream, but my mind kept wandering.
quotes.name: Steven Wright

quotes.message: They say there's no harm in daydreaming, but there is.
quotes.name: Charlaine Harris

quotes.message: If you don't daydream your life is a nightmare.
quotes.name: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.message: Everything starts as somebody's daydream.
quotes.name: Larry Niven

quotes.message: Daydreams were dangerous because they made her wish for things she could never have.
quotes.name: Julie Garwood

quotes.message: We can imprison ourselves with our wants, wishes, and false dreams.
quotes.name: Kilroy J. Oldster

quotes.message: Day dreaming is actually research for the next book.
quotes.name: Val Richards

quotes.message: Daydreaming allows you to play out scenarios where you miraculously save the day. You play out scenarios in your head that are kind of crazy, and then you personally, heroically resolve them.
quotes.name: Mark Waters

quotes.message: Unlike any other form of thought, daydreaming is its own reward.
quotes.name: Michael Pollan
